entry.title: RESUME

entry.content:
NATALIA JASINSKA

  • Status: M.Sc. Tourism Business - currently Office Manager
  • Fields: Office administration, production management, e-shops management
  • Tech: Microsoft Office, various invoicing software
  • Loves: Healthy food and good books, sport

As a committed administrative employee I want to developmyself personally and professionally in areas where Ican apply my up-to-date knowledge and experience such Human Resources, Customer Service, office management.

 EXPERIENCE                                        

Aug 2016 - present - Office Manager - Sunbeam Joinery Limited (formerly Smokus Joinery Ltd.) - London

Preparing payroll and cis payments - Controlling correspondence - Purchasing of materials - Dealing with clients and suppliers - Preparing quotes for clients - Preparing reports, spreadsheets and letters - Invoicing using Evolution M Software - Oversee and supervise all administrative functions - CITB grants and funding applications forms - Dealing with training providers - resources functions - Manage, record and maintain employee leave time records - Maintain and update administrative and personnel databases and other correspondence - Organize office operations and procedures

May 2016 - Jun 2016 Volunteering / Office Assistant - Consular Section of the
Polish Embassy in London

Helping the departments and consuls (law department, passports and visas, legal affairs) and assist with their duties
law department: Filling the forms about lost identity cards,
legal affairs: respond to the letters from courts, police and other institutions about sought people, register the incoming/outgoing correspondence in the system, sending back to the right Municipal Councils in Poland the driving licenses that have been found around UK, preparing the lists about all detained and arrested polish citizen in the UK passports and visas: register the passport applications in the system, assist with conference in Polish Embassy in London

Oct 2015 - Apr 2016 - Assistant Manager - The Master Cleaners, London

Customer service (dealing face to face, over the phone and by e-mail, dealing with
suppliers, arranging for the timely deliveries and preparing for the drivers, dealing with
customer complaints, comments and queries) processing orders in SPOT, checkout service, operating the till

Apr 2014 - Sep 2015 - Customer Assistant - White Rose Laundries, London

Customer service (dealing face to face, on phone, dealing with customer complaints,
comments and queries), processing orders in SPOT, tagging, checking , arranging for the timely deliveries, preparing deliveries, checkout service, reports, responsible for operating the till, train new employees, managing the shop

Sep 2012 - Mar 2013 - Online shop administrator - Studio Wnetrz Jaromir Szydlowski, Szczecin

Online shop administration, relations with clients and suppliers (from Germany), customer service- dealing on phone, update website content (products, photos, informations, prices), calculating prices- Microsoft Office Excel

Oct 2011 - Sep 2012 - Shops Administrator - PartyDeco.pl, Szczecin

Relations with customers and suppliers, making orders, preparing reports, preparing
duty roster

Jun 2011 - Oct 2011 - Assistant Production Manager - PartyDeco.pl, Szczecin

Working with production management software (Mozart, Subiekt GT), making tasks for
employees, assist with production operations and management

Aug 2010 - Jan 2011 - Administrative employee - Dalkia Services LLC, Lodz

Processing invoices for co partnerships,working with financial programme Oracle E - Business Suite

Aug 2010 - Jan 2011 - Secretary at Language School - Top English School, Szczecin

Customer service face to face and over the phone, dealing with queries, sending emails
and making telephone calls, booking lessons, maintaining student record

EDUCATION
